This test allocates a number of different sized buffers.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


PASS Creating buffer with size=1024 succeeded
PASS There should be no non-green pixels on the canvas.
PASS Creating buffer with size=1048576 succeeded
PASS There should be no non-green pixels on the canvas.
PASS Creating buffer with size=33554432 succeeded
PASS There should be no non-green pixels on the canvas.
PASS Creating buffer with size=67108864 succeeded
PASS There should be no non-green pixels on the canvas.
PASS Creating buffer with size=3221225472 failed
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
